title: globally available events
extract: A global event aggregate can find the total, minimum, maximum, or average value of a collection of events, or the number of events. For example, if your events are flight departures, you can determine the average number of delayed flight departures over the past month or another time period.
extract_html: A global event aggregate can find the total, minimum, maximum, or average value of a collection of events, or the number of events. For example, if your events are flight departures, you can determine the average number of delayed flight departures over the past month or another time period.
